sk1.name: Sprint
sk1.desc: Slardar moves significantly faster, but takes bonus damage.

sk2.name: Slithereen Crush
sk2.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units. After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

sk3.name: Bash
sk3.desc: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy. The duration is doubled against creeps.

sk4.name: Amplify Damage
sk4.desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.
